values: heyyyyyyyy new red hairrrr ! you can't really see the different shades in what i did, but i wasn't wearing makeup and was camera shy :\ the love of my life is coming in 17 days. and he gets to be my hot winter formal date♥ school almost kicked my ass last week. i may look into getting some kind of sedative prescription for test anxiety. that'd be alot cooler, so i wouldn't hyperventilate/vomit before midterms and shit. nicotine update: 4th time to quit. officially 7 non-smoking days after my 3rd relapse. sigh. over and out. peace in ♥

amazing weekend. ever had constant butterflies for 4 days? it's pretty nice. blake forgot his cologne and said i could KEEP IT. ohhh yeah. NO MORE CIGARETTES FOR ME: so i don't get lung cancer so i can still take birth control so i won't have an old man cough so i'll have one less addiction and $8 more a week. and because my boyfriend is doing it too :) THE END. wish me luck. you know i'll just end up smoking more pot. meh.

my significant other is more thoughtful than yours: ♥♥ i saw neil diamond last night. it quite possibly may have been the peak of my life thus far. and i definately got 2 tshirts that i plan to wear all the time. the end. ps. FOUR days. aaaaaaand mine♥

"... do you ever smile and find it shameful because you don't know who you are?" -nfg. i have exactly what i want. i'm just not sure what to do with it. i need to get my shit together. the future freaks me out. el fin. ♥ ps. mine in 9 days.

$40 for something i got for free. rockkkkk. ♥!! ps. Auto response from JettBlack10024 (7:52:15 PM): If I could kiss you now I would kiss you now again and again til I don't know where I begin and where you end.... Shout out to a special someone in tx u know who you are *melt* 22 days♥

i think i suckered a girl to give me $40 for my bastard of a cat. he keeps taking his poop out of the litterbox and playing with it. so there's sandy shit all over my kitchen floor. awesome. she's supposed to take him tomorrow.. i'll keep you posted, but someone pray that she takes him. the new PANIC! cd is so effing good. if you don't have it in your life, you suck. and they TOTALLY stayed at my house :) AND i'm totally seeing them in less than a month with a certain mr. blake wilson♥... *wiggles in chair* i get a 130 point handicap in bowling because i suck so much. so i start out with a shitload more points than everyone else. it's awesome, but mike still beat me. end. ps. the boy is coming in 23 days. i.couldnt.possibly.be.more.excited♥ pps. i still have a damn respiratory infection. i might just go back to smoking cigs if stopping didn't help my ass at all.
MY LITTLES ARE THE SHIZZLE. i love them. they're badasses. the end. peace in. ps. vegas. ♥♥♥♥♥♥ UPDATE: he's coming in 24 days♥ *giddy is a fucking understatement* !!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

i notice the more shit for school that i have to do, the more journal entries i write. see: PROCRASTINATION, below.

LJ Interests meme results

  1. broke ass windshield wipers:
    my car and i have a love/hate relationship. alot of shit is broken, including the windshield wipers. also: my blinker keeps making the blinking noise after i turn it off (but the light doesn't blink), i can't figure out how to turn on the radio, my brakes are shot to hell, the passenger seat is stuck at an upright position and can't recline because rachel broke off the STEEL handle, i have a serious crack in my dashboard from when my shit got jacked, and i need 984372652 lanes to make a u-turn. but i do love my car.
  2. cute boys:
    boys. i love them. i get new crushes every .05 seconds, and they last about an hour. odds are, if you're a boy, i have wanted to/will make out with you. i'm kind of pickyish, but i end up falling for pretty much EVERY boy i come in contact with. true story.
  3. empire records:
    i LOVE this movie. ethan embry is my favorite. gah. i just love this fucking movie. "damn the man, save the empire"
  4. fun earrings:
    since i cut my hair supershort i think sometimes fun earrings look awkward but i used to wear big earrings all the time. i always lose one of them when i'm drunk, so i also have quite an extensive collection of mismatched earrings.
  5. jello shots:
    my record is 17 jello shots, along with 4 cups of punch and prepartying at one of the rugby parties last year. i remember keeping them stuffed in my pockets/shirt, and having like 6 on me at any given time. i'm a big fan of the red and the orange, but they never have green which is the shit. i WILL beat my record this year, just you wait.
  6. making out:
    yes yes and yes. all the time. please.
  7. procrastination:
    i'm the best. seriously. you have no idea.
  8. skirts:
    i wear them everyday.
    urban outfitters has the best ones.
    the end.
  9. pink condoms:
    i would say this one is pretty self-explanitory.. everything is better pink.
  10. good italian food:
    keyword: GOOD. i'm half italian and i was raised on the good stuff, not this mainstream olive branch shit you people here eat. i'm an italian food elitist, and damn proud of it. no one can cook like my grandmother. come for dinner at the speranzella house, it's right up there with sex.

so, my sorority wants me to wear a wig during rush. our advisor approached me about 6 hours into the 12 hour long first day of work week, and told me that if i didn't dye my hair i'd have to be "behind the scenes" (not rushing girls).. which really pissed me off becausse i can't dye my effing hair again or it will fall out. i wanted to punch a bitch in the face. i have all of my shit for rush all together, i bought all my required shit way ahead of time and i was totally prepared. now i can't rush girls because i have pink and purple hair? WTF. nowhere is it written down specific mandatory hair colors.. you can't do that, it's called DISCRIMINATION, MOTHER FUCKERS. THEN someone suggested i wear a wig. And somewhere in the middle of this drama they made me cry my face off, i had a panic attack, said fuck sororities, threatened to quit, and didn't show up yesterday. apparently then a bunch of the girls started a petition saying they love me as i am and don't want me to change and won't let me wear a wig. but then those girls got yelled at. i'm really touched, though. i'm sick of this bullshit, but i heard through the grapevine that the old ladies were talking about how they can't lose me in the chapter and how much they need me for rush because i'm one of the most outgoing and personable people in our chapter, WHAM. and not to toot my own horn *toot toot*.. but its TRUE. i'm going to talk with them now, hopefully with some kind of non-lame resolution. i'll keep you posted. oh, and i've been made into a hot cartoon: love love love. ♥ ps. fuck conformity.

officially moved in.

i feel like such a damn grownup, it's ridiculous. i've never had to control my own air settings and my brother yelled at me for leaving the air on high when i was in padre for 10 days. meh. i have alot to learn.

everyone is invited to come over and play at my new garage apartment!! you can sleep on the amazing green futon and roll around on my shag rug. AND you have to check out the effing hot nightstand that i BUILT. that's right. almost all of my furniture came unassembled and my mom and i had no idea. so, i definately assembled a nightstand, bitches. it has a little cd rack on it and a drawer and these 2 fancy silver poles that support half of it, its effing sweet. i am so proud of it. my brother was up until 5am putting together my bed and dressers and shit, but the nightstand is the highlight of it all.

i leave for hawaii tomorrow for 2 weeks with the fam, and im more than a little excited. golden goddess status, here i come. also: me vs. skin cancer.. it's ONNNNNNN. 

this head automatica song is the catchiest shit i've heard in a damn long time. i mean for real. check it out if you don't already know. 

back in 2 weeks!

aloha baby.

pappa shuler bought me THE prettiest light green futon ever from urban yesterday. 
and a shag rug, some pillows, a lamp, and wall art. and a shower curtain. 
wham. new places to live are exciting. and things are finally coming along.

on not so happy notes, i got my hair fixed (to please the pops .. he requested something "tamer")
alas, now my hair isn't as fun, and now cut like a un-cute boy. bleeehhhh. :(
this is getting old. 

it needs to stop raining here and not be 60 degrees.
.. lame summer.

.:home in FIVE days:.

ps- my new cellphone is doesn't work. and the customer service people at cingular are bastards.

*note-- i deleted the picture in my last entry bc it was so big it was pissing me off. hooray. 

greetings from the beautiful pennsylvania, where everything is old as shit and smells like smoke.
i heart the east coast, but only in small doses. 

i can't wait until may 31st, when i come home and i get to move into my new garage apartment (minus a bed, and all furniture except a desk and kitchen table set.. who wants to come over for a slumber party on the floor?!) my mom is doing alot of shit for me, which is cool.. she's ordering me a bed and mattress and dressers and all that good stuff plus a sofa bed and having it shipped to texas for when i get back from south padre on the 9th. so that will be fabulous. except the assembling everything part. (do things normally come shipped fully in tact?) 

a beautiful black man with long dreadlocks, more piercings than me and gorgeous tattoos all over his arms is going to fix my hair sometime this week and i couldn't be more excited. 

i see my grandmother on sunday = fat cash for me.

i also got a new cell that should be in working order tuesday or wednesday, so feel free to text me lots and lots because my phone is no longer ghetto, awesome.

until then,
enjoy texas.. and someone get a tan for me please.

ps- this is the longest i've gone without smoking in YEARS. seriously. sad..

what the hell is with it being cold outside? fucking texas, get your shit together.
it's effing may for god's sake. 

update: fuschia flash (i think it looks more red. oh well)

it's only temporary, because i'm getting it cut/colored differently on saturday by someone who's actually good at hair and isn't in a dorm room. (an actual hairstylist.. if my clues weren't good) but i was just bored.

these next few weeks will kick my ass but i cannot wait for this summer: 

may 15-31: pennsylvania with the fam
may 31- june 2: return to ft. worth to move into my own APARTMENT, mofos!! 
june 2-9: roadtrip & etc. to padre with a couple of my favorite people
june 25- july 6: effing HAWAII

after that is summer school and perhaps some work and blah but aside from that, i'm PUMPED about the upcoming months. fosho. although i did realized today how much i'm going to miss seeing everyone everyday at school. not at school, but like in passing and such. meh. 

everyone needs to come visit and play at my new apartment. and yay. 

i really want bam margera's wrist heart tattoos.
i think my dad would literally die.

ps- i need to get my pictures to be less massive, i apologize.
here's what i remember from saturday night.. pre-vomit and $100 parking ticket. rock on.

i just had the best weekend of my entire life. 

i really hope all of you have at least one day in your life that is complete happiness and perfection. everyone needs one of those.

i have the most amazing friends who i never express my appreciation for enough.
so thanks <3
and life is beautiful.

my birthday is on tuesday. 20 is a little worthless, but I love birthdays regardless.

as i have said before in one of my christmas break entries, pennsylvania is worthless, but enjoyable.. ish.  
i'm here for 6 days, whereupon i will gorge myself on sleep, free food, and donations from family members. 

here's an update, for those of you who care.

- my dad didn't kill me when he saw my rainbow brite hair. (this is a good thing)
- and i still got an ipod for no apparent reason, aside from the fact my dad got a fatty bonus and likes to spend money. (this is also a good thing)
- i saw my grandparents and their new house on the farm in maryland, they didn't kill me either. (although it seems the popular response to my lip stud is "it looks like a booger. i want to pull it off your face" my reply: "i'm a bleeder, be careful with the pulling. messes are bad")
- got fat cash from the aforementioned g-parents for my recent academic ass-kickery.(the best part was they each gave me money seperately, and i don't know if they know that they BOTH gave me ridiculous amounts of cash... score?)
- tomorrow the mom and i are headed to the biggest mall in the east coast to hit up their 2-story urban outfitters hardcore for the upcoming birthday. (this means more pretty skirts and scandalous tshirts and earrings oh my! *insane amounts of giddiness*)
- i have since decided that knowing zero people in the lovely state of pennsylvania is rather liberating. it's like an amazing escape from reality, ish. east coast style, so there's less skirt wearing and a few more goose-bumps, but i dig it. 
- friday nicole and leah are picking me up from the airport where i will be greeted with scandality and then their fine asses are staying the night in funkytown with me. it shall be glorious.
- myspace will be the death of me, i swear.
- the best way to wake up is someone telling you you're beautiful, it's true. 

all for now, i love all of you..

and since i'm east coast i'll throw in a little profanity..
PEACE OUT BITCHES <3
